title: How long does it take you to get 6,300 IP w/o boost?
body:
Hey guys!

I wanted to know on average how long it takes you to get 6,300 without boosts

I'm guessing a bit over a week, since the most Ip I have gotten without boosts is 1.2k in a day.

so, please tell me on average how long it takes ya :D

replies.body:
6300/((average IP per game)*(number of games played))

solve for number of games played.  Multiply that by the sum of the average of time per match and the average sunk time per match.  Then take the amount of free time you have to play the game every day, and divide it by that sum.  There ya go, how many days it takes you to get it.

don't forget multipliers like first win of the day bonuses and whatnot.

Depends.

If you dont have any comitments, like school, work. etc, and you play constantly, you can get it in a week or so.
Assuming about 10 games a day
I don't think I have ever played 10 games in a day.... Like at least a month for me.

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Influence_Points

1.8585 IP per minute average across wins and losses and an average of 17 IP bonus per game, plus 150 IP for your first win.  Assuming 4 games per day with two win2 per day and 2 hours of game time that's 441 IP per day.  That means you need to play at that rate for 14.28 days.

**Learn to google and learn to do math.**

I googled and found old posts from forum, and FYI, looking up something on the wiki doesn't involve doing math. :D

I was just asking how long on average it takes you, not for a calculation.
